text: Sport Relief is a charity event from Comic Relief that happens every two years. It is held in association with BBC Sport. The event brings together the worlds of sport and entertainment to raise money to help vulnerable people in both the UK and the world's poorest countries. At the heart of the campaign is the Sport Relief Mile. ==Related pages== *Children in Need ==Other websites== *Sport Relief Website *Donate * *All Out For India *Sport Relief Fairtrade Cotton Socks * Bench Press Challenge Category:BBC Category:Sports
title: Sport Relief
